text: In my opinion it would be nice to have the Image "Settings" like  Alt text, Size and Maximum Size to be behind a accordion like it is in the marketplace with the contents of a theme:

Understood about the sentiment tha the image field is kinda verbose at the moment.

Do you feel it would encourage folks to not follow accessibility and SEO best practices if you hide the alt text field like that though?
Good point i also regard the Image and the Alt text as more important than sizing. So, a good middleground might be to only hide those?!
